评论详情: I absolutely love this striped long-sleeve crewneck! It’s the perfect blend of emo, grunge, and Y2K aesthetics, making it a standout piece in my wardrobe. The soft, lightweight fabric feels great to wear, and the fit is super comfortable—casual yet stylish.  The stripes and crewneck design give it that classic Harajuku-inspired vibe, and it pairs effortlessly with jeans, skirts, or layered looks. It’s versatile and works for anyone, whether you’re into goth, scene, or just want a unique, edgy style.  Overall, this shirt is an amazing find for anyone looking to embrace alternative fashion. Highly recommend it for both men and women who want to make a bold fashion statement!
Good quality and perfect fit
Daughter loves it.

My teen put this on their Christmas wish list. It didn't arrive in time for Christmas, Amazon delivery's fault. She absolutely loves it though! She wanted a large which I guessed would be huge on her since she is 13 and pretty tiny. It fits exactly how she hoped. It's long enough to cover her bum and not tight, so it's a win for her! It does collect lint and things in the wash, but overall it's a great shirt!

Edgy, Comfortable, and Stylish Perfect Grunge Look  I absolutely love the grunge style clothes I purchased. The combination of vintage vibes and modern touches makes these pieces stand out. The oversized flannel shirts are super soft and cozy, and they pair perfectly with ripped jeans or leggings. The distressed band tees are authentic-looking and give off that effortlessly cool, edgy vibe.  The quality of the materials exceeded my expectations, especially for the price. The jeans fit well with just the right amount of stretch, and the combat boots I bought complete the look perfectly. What I love most is how versatile these pieces are I can mix and match them for casual days out or layer them for a more bold  They’re comfortable, durable, and make you feel confident. Highly recommend for anyone looking to add a bit of edge to the wardrobe
Sleeves very very short
Exactly as expected. Size is right, fits good.

评论概述: daughter loved this sweater for christmas
评论详情: Daughter loved this sweater for christmas!

评论概述: Not full sleeves but goes down long enough
评论详情: Sleeves don’t go all the way down to your wrist but other than that it’s a perfect fit, soft, and comfortable. T-shirt thickness so it’s going to keep you warm in the cold. Color matches the picture.

This is such a comfy oversized striped long sleeve shirt. I got a size XL for my 5'4 165lbs body and it fits great. It is slouchy and comfortable without looking ginormous on me. I like that the colors are saturated and just like in the picture. Love it!

I ordered this sweater for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. The oversized cut really lends well to the grunge style and she says it's very cozy and soft. I like that it's made from 100% cotton and will get softer with each wash. Great quality overall. Would definitely recommend!

评论概述: Very soft long sleeve striped crewneck with a grunge flair
评论详情: The garment fits true to size, and its softness and comfort are enhanced by the fact that it's made of 100% cotton, which is a significant plus. The combination of gray and black stripes evokes a nostalgic sense of the '90s grunge fashion era, which I absolutely love.
This is really cute. It’s comfortable and the size chart is accurate. However… if you have pets, or a husband that sheds… this will collect all the hair for you, free of charge.

评论概述: Soft fabric but sleeves are too short
评论详情: I gave this 4 stars rather than 5 because of the sleeves. The colors look good and the fabric is good quality. It feels soft and the length of the shirt is fine but the sleeves are not that long. If you are tall and have long arms the sleeves are more like three quarter rather than to the wrist. But if you like three quarter sleeves, like I do, then this isn't a negative. But if you're looking for long sleeves as shown in the photo, you will be disappointed if you have longer arms.

This top is great! The fabric is soft and comfy, and the fit is roomy, as promised! I like the wide sleeves that are hemmed but do not have a ribbed binding. This will be perfect as the weather gets cooler!

I love that this shirt is oversized and 100 cotton, which will continue to get softer and softer over time. It washed well in cold water, tumble dry low, remove and hang quickly. No problem. However, if you ever happen to accidentally shrink 100 cotton, wash it in cold, then hang it up and gently stretch it back to size and shape. (You can also do this in strategic spots to get extra camouflage for your trouble spots!)  I ordered a medium shirt and it is loose on me just as I'd hoped, and a length that I like. I am not crazy over the color, but I knew that going in, so no stars off. I bought this solely because it is 100 cotton, which is so hard to get anymore. However, I can't wear it out anywhere. I have a 129 lb. husky malamute who blows his coat year round. I think when I wear this shirt that I have nearly as much hair as he does, lol. But I knew this would happen going in. I just really wanted a soft, breathable, comfy, cozy shirt for those cold days that I love to cuddle my dog and drink hot tea- and this shirt is PERFECT for that in my book!  I DO recommend this wonderful 100 cotton striped shirt.  5 stars
Comfortable sweater, nice simple style for fall and winter. Fits well and it’s warm and soft.

My wife loves the oversized fit of this top, but the material feels a bit thinner than expected. It’s perfect for layering, and the grunge goth style with stripes gives it a cool, casual vibe. The size fits well without being too baggy.

I went through the emo/grunge phase in high school and I had a sweater just like this. I put thumb holes in it and safety pins. This long sleeve is nice and has a stretch to it. My only complaint is I wish it was longer. It isn't short but for this style I feel like it should be more oversized.

I love this shirt. It is long sleeve, but its light weight like a tee shirt. The fabric is soft enough. It looks great even after washing. I love a classic striped shirt like this. I would size up, as I want extra oversized, but overall, it fits well regardless!

评论概述: Nice fit and holds shape after washing
评论详情: The cut and fit of this t-shirt provides a nice casual look without looking baggy and sloppy. I would describe it more as a relaxed fit than "oversized" unless you order a size up for that effect. The material has a nice light-medium weight and stretch, and holds it shape and size (no shrinkage!) after laundering. The sleeves hit the wrist and the hemline is just below the hips. It may be worn with skinny jeans or leggings, and you can dress it up or down depending on what you wear with it including accessories and type of shoes or sandals. It's an all-season top as well.

评论概述: Baggy, Loose, and Perfect for My Teen’s Style!
评论详情: My teen absolutely loves this oversized striped T-shirt! It’s exactly her style—baggy, loose, and super comfortable. The cotton fabric is soft and breathable, with just the right amount of stretch. It holds its shape perfectly after washing and doesn’t shrink, which is a huge plus.  This top fits into her grunge and emo aesthetic perfectly, and she pairs it with jeans or leggings for a cool, laid-back look. It’s versatile enough to wear year-round and works for a variety of occasions, from school to casual hangouts. Overall, it’s a great buy for any teen who loves oversized, alternative fashion! Highly recommend.

This is a nice oversized long-sleeved crew neck. It is a breathable tee-shirt material that's great for cool fall day's. It is very well made; there has been no problems with it fading or shrinking in the wash!

The shirt fits well enough and is true to size. I personally would have liked a less tight collar, but that is easily remedied with a pair of scissors. As long as I don’t run somewhere with said scizzors, everything should be ok!

This is a cute top, something I would throw on for a fall weekend with jeans. It's a lightweght knit like a t-shirt but not see through. Has a good amount of stretch. It does rise up a bit when i lift my arms, and the stripes line up perfectly on one side seam, but are completely off on the other seam. The stripes look fine while wearing so I'll have to investigate that more. Haven't washed yet so can't speak to that.

评论概述: My tween's favorite long sleeve T
评论详情: No, kidding, it's been 72 hours and she's still wearing it. It does look really nice. I don't get grunge out of it but it's dark grey and black but no holes are faux rips. The size is great, the fabric is soft and stitching is top notch. Couldn't be happier with it.
Very comfy and cute to boot. It is a good early fall shirt, not too think but also not too thick. Colors don't bleed either.
this is so stylish and looks great. it fits amazing and is so soft and comfortable to wear

This Long Sleeve Crewneck Oversized Striped T-Shirt is cute, but the wide sleeves fit oddly.  It is very comfy, perfectly oversized and roomy.  I ordered the medium/large and it fit my 5'5" 135lb frame just like I wanted it to.It's the sleeves I can't get past; they're too short I think?  I'm unsure of the exact issue with the sleeves they are just off.  It's 100% cotton, so maybe it will fit better after a wash or two.  It could be a manufacturing issue and specific to this, single, shirt.
This is a really cute shirt. I love how oversized it is! It's very stylish and I love wearing it with either black leggings or black skinny jeans for the full emo effect.

Shirt is very soft and stretchy, however super boxy. I am a size 12 and got the Med-Large. It fit fine, but was super boxy and unflattering. I asked my husband what he thought, and he said it gave off Freddy vibes, so there's also that. It will be good to wear around the house, but not something I will reach for to wear out.

评论概述: It's ok if you're not picky about fabric or weight
评论详情: The black is vibrant and contrasts well with the gray. The only thing I don't like much is the material, it feels very odd. Not cotton, very heavy, not soft, just heavy and almost like a plastic version of fabric. Or the closest you can come to it. I wanted to like it, but it's just too much going on for my liking.
